Title: The Angry Super Saiyan! Throw Your Hat in the Ring, Son Goku!
Actors: Masako Nozawa, Ryûsei Nakao, Jôji Yanami
Plot: While Gohan races to save Piccolo, Goku inflicts a Super-Saiyan beating on Frieza. The blonde brawler's impressive new powers drive his opponent to a desperate counterattack that could obliterate Namek!
